reviewText: I thought this was very good. He shows idols in churches of Mary setting on the ark and etc. This DVD will offend Catholics. The Catholic Church Has been taken over by some kind of strange Mary cult - what do you want me to say? It just has been taken over by a Mary fetish cult.
LOL. Seriously? A complete, laughable joke and waste of paper. Just hilarious how ignorant the author is. Hopefully he won't lead many astray with this type of nonsense.

Clearly, this man DOES NOT know the Catholic Church! May God forgive your ignorance!! Don't wast your money buying this garbage and listening to the lies that the devil makes up to deceive and divide!
